metadata.title: Pseudotime inference using neural optimal transport

annotations.description: To infer a global ordering of differentiation state, we sought to infer a real-time-informed pseudotime on the basis of neural optimal transport47 in the scPoli latent space.
We first grouped organoid age in days into seven bins ((0, 15], (15, 30], (30,60], (60, 90], (90, 120], (120, 150], (150, 450]).
We used moscot48 to solve a temporal neural problem.
